citations.narrative:
The facility was unable to locate the contingency plan for the handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of
animals in the event of an emergency for review at the time of inspection. Contingency plans must be documented
according to the requirements of this section, reviewed annually, and the plan and all annual review documentation must
be made available to APHIS officials upon request. Ensure that the contingency plan is in place at this site and available
for review by APHIS officials at the time of inspection. Correct by: 24 July 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Farm Manager.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility was unable to locate the contingency plan for the handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of 
animals in the event of an emergency for review at the time of inspection. Contingency plans must be documented 
according to the requirements of this section, reviewed annually, and the plan and all annual review documentation must 
be made available to APHIS officials upon request. Ensure that the contingency plan is in place at this site and available 
for review by APHIS officials at the time of inspection. Correct by: 24 July 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Farm Manager. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
